member.name: IAppxSourceContentGroupMapReader.GetAutomaticGroups
member.summary: Gets the automatic content group(s) from the source content group map.
member.param: An enumerator for the automatic content group(s).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxSourceContentGroupMapReader.GetRequiredGroup
member.summary: Gets the required content group from the source content group map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxSourceContentGroupMapReader
member.summary: Gets information about the source content group map.
